src_original: yatra prayatnānantaramabhivyaktistatrānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ vyavadhānamupapadyate. vyavadhānāpohācca  prayatnānantarabhāvino 'rthasayopalabdhilakṣaṇābhivyaktirbhavatīti. na tu śabdasyānupalabdhikāraṇaṃ  kiṃ cidupapadyate yasya prayatnānantaramapohāt śabdasyopalabdhilakṣaṇābhivyaktirbhavatīti.
